name: Lost Transmissions
description: When an acclaimed music producer goes off his medication for schizophrenia, his friends chase him though the LA music scene to help commit him to a psychiatric hospital, revealing the troubling inadequacies of our mental health ca...

review.author: mike-c-b
review.heading: Interesting but depressing
review.reviewBody:
Mostly real performances from Simon Pegg (acting as a scatter-brain with grand creativity). Juno Temple is the most realistic performer but slows the films pace to a crawl. Other actors range essentially play pirates.

If you're a happy, smart person in general you'd find it very hard to associate or connect with the film in any way.

keywords: schizophrenia,songwriter,record producer,chase,inspired by a true story
